item.description:
TOSOB host Royce Banks from Chicago, Illinois

 

20 Years of Dance Experience

First Chicago-Style Stepper recognized by the organization “A Stepper You Should Know”

Placed twice in the World’s Largest Stepper’s Competition

ALL Steppers are encouraged not to miss this Workshop

Workshop $30 PER PERSON

AFTER WORKSHOP SET FOLLOWING FOR WORK SHOP ATTENDEES.

$10.00 FEE FOR NON WORKSHOP ATTENDEES.

 

Crystal Ramsey

Wish I could be there...Royce is my favorite instructor. We love Royce in North Carolina...I feel comfortable saying you won't be disappointed, don't miss this fabulous instructor.

 

SUMMER MADNESS STEPPER'S CONTEST FEAT Royce Banks, Christa Lee

 

http://youtu.be/4T9jLTEhMmw

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Something for everyone Workshop
